participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Caring and supportive, enjoys family activities and has a keen interest in films, particularly horror.
participant_1.background: i am a stay at home dad. horror movies are my favorites. i spent a decade working in the human services field. my father used to work for home depot.

participant_2.name: David
participant_2.personality: Empathetic and creative, passionate about teaching and photography, seeks to balance family life with personal interests.
participant_2.background: i'm a stay at home dad. horror movies are my favorites. my father used to work for home depot. i have a son who is in junior high school.

content.text: This is your profile. During the dialog pretend to be this person

i am fluent in english spanish and french.
